channel.title: Distrelec Jira
channel.description: An XML representation of a search request

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7029] Replacement of ... with â€¦
item.description:
In the current AT-DQ feed, "..." are replaced with the string "â€¦". In Hybris the data still looks normal (so does it in PIM, too), but in the FF feed this string pops up. In FF it's converted to a ?

An example:

ID 11035715 on Q:
http://test.distrelec.at/de/werkzeuge-messtechnik/werkzeuge/handwerkzeuge/zangen/abisolierzangen/abisolierzange-1182130/c/cat-345878?q=*&filter_productFamilyCode=cat-345878

On P, the same data works fine: http://www.distrelec.ch/de/werkzeuge-messtechnik/werkzeuge/handwerkzeuge/zangen/abisolierzangen/abisolierzange-1182130/c/cat-345878?q=*&filter_productFamilyCode=cat-345878

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Hi Daniela

Strange finding. Maybe there is anywhere a conversion... I will check this next week.

Cheers
Will

I checked the product 11035715:

FF Q CH DE is fine:
http://10.191.21.143:8080/FACT-Finder-hybris/Detail.ff?id=11035715&sid=A7728EFC248CD0C79B5CD5F9DEFCA266&uid=1692933936&site=demoshop&sourceRefKey=5mpwUfceq&channel=distrelec_Q_7310_ch_de

FF Q AT DE is not correct:
http://10.191.21.143:8080/FACT-Finder-hybris/Detail.ff?id=11035715&sid=A7728EFC248CD0C79B5CD5F9DEFCA266&uid=1692933936&site=demoshop&sourceRefKey=HsT9OGall&channel=distrelec_Q_7320_at_de

pimWebUseB03	|Abisolierquerschnitt~~mm²=0.03?1.0|Länge~~mm=130|

--> pimWebUseB03 data in hmc Q is correct.

Need to check the export file as a next step.

1182130";"43.6";"cat-345878";"550300"

I will write an email to Mr. Türk. CC to you.

Cheers
Will

Hallo Herr Türk

Wir haben festgestellt das bei folgendem Produkt das Attribut „Abisolierquerschnitt“ falsch im FF Q AT DE channel falsch dargestellt wird:

pimWebUseB03 |Abisolierquerschnitt~~mm²=0.03?1.0|Länge~~mm=130|

Im FF P CH DE channel wird es korrekt dargestellt:

WebUse |Länge~~m=0.13|Abisolierquerschnitt=0.03...1.0 mm²|

Wir exportieren dieses Attribut für beide channels genau gleich: „0.03…1.0“

Wo liegt hier das Problem?

Besten Dank für Ihre Hilfe und schöne Grüsse
W. Spalinger
Mr Türk told me we should export ". . ." insted of "..."

PIM import change: replacing dots "..." with ". . .". Ready for Q deployment. After the deployment:

  • reset hash values for all products
  • reimport DQ german PIM file on Q
  • check products after successful PIM import
GER DQ PIM import started on Q, will check status on friday 26.05.2015
tested locally, works fine. I will recheck it on Q when the PIM import finished.
values were not updated during the DQ PIM import on Q. I will restart the import and let it run over the wknd.
replacing now ... with . . . in FF DQ3 export for all DQ attributes. committed to v3.5 branch
Needs another Q deployment to test the FF DQ export.
Ready for Q deployment v3.5.2

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6913] Change the Education Registration Page (/education/register)
item.description:
Please change the Education Registration Page (Form) for Germany according to the attached documents. On top there should be a dropdown with the choices mentioned in the document.

Two of the upload boxes can be left away so we only have one in the middle. The translation to English and the final content for German will be uploaded next week.

The inputs shall be sent to the following address:
education@distrelec.com

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Please change everything according to these documents.
Hi Ruben, please estimate, thx.

Hi Simon,
Please start the implementation tomorrow. It should be deployed with sprint 2015-06.
BR, Rafael

The email address is the same for CH and DE ?
If this will be available also for other countries, please add the list of emails. Thx
It's always education@distrelec.com

Please test on Q.
http://test.distrelec.ch/education/register

The headlines for the french version look bad because it's on two lines and there's no space between the lines. (see screenshots)

The version for DE somehow gives me an error message. (see screenshot)
check now http://test.distrelec.de/education/register
DE is fine now, headline still has to be adapted
Please change the appearance of the headlines so they don't look squeezed together as they do right now.
Hi Ruben, please change shortly, thx.
Please test after the next deployment

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6768] NPS (Net Promoter Score) Implementation
item.description:
On the order confirmation page (thank you note) we Need to have 3 new elements:

  • One introduction title regarding "How likely are you to recommend us to a colleague?"
  • Radio button with values from 0-10 (the NPS)
  • One free text
  • NPS Type: "Order Confirmation" (constant hidden value in the order confirmation page)

The values need to be stored somewhere in the DB and retrievable (auto-Generation of a Report).
Generation of the "Feedback" report must be generated DAILY and sent to email addresses provided by ALE.

This Report should contain:

  • Input Date (Mandatory), i.e. YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS
  • NPS Type (Mandatory) i.e. Order, Delivery Deprecated
  • Domain (Mandatory) i.e. www.distrelec.ch, www.distrelec.de,...
  • Order number (Mandatory)
  • Customer number
  • Customer Name (Mandatory)
  • Customer email
  • Company Name
  • NPS (Mandatory)
  • Free text comment

Suggestion: Develop the Generation of a Report over a timeframe (definable, first Suggestion is one week) and a cron-job which runs on a weekly Basis.

Note:

  • The Formular (NPS dropbox and Free Text Comment, hidden NPS Type) needs to be reusable on a CMS/Merchandizing page. The Merchandizing page will have an other hidden NPS Type (e.g. "Delivery Confirmation"), that will require to retrieve additional variables from http request
  • This Report will feed Qlikview to create proper reporting (Definition still required).
  • For now Export always each ones in a flatfile (csv), ";" separator

If clarity in specification are required, come by to David.

Variables that come with the url:
https://www.distrelec.de/de/cms/nps?salesorg=7350&contactnum=326411&order=003UUL0A&cnumber=1202553&fname=Armin&namn=Freaking&email=zilling%40most-mobile.net&lang=de&company=MOST%20Mobile%20Specials%20GmbH&delivery=20150622

The url parameters should be passed (could happen that not all urls come with all parameters complete or even some missing)

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Please estimate

Hi David,

should we store also the customer information or it is anonymous? What should we store in addition to the informations above ? (order number, customer number, customer name, customer email, etc.)

Hi Nabil,

Yes, at least those informations need to be in a retrievable report:
order number, customer number, customer name, customer email, company Name, NPS, and the free text comment

In that sence those informations need to be stored to be able to retrieve all the others: order number, NPS, free text comment

The introduction title will be:
"How likely are you to recommend us to a colleague?"

Hi David,

what are the different NPS types? Could you make a list please? Thx

/Nabil.

At the Moment only two NPS types: "Order Confirmation", Delivery Confirmation"

The constant "Order Confirmation" will be written as NPS type every time that the customer gives a Rating on the thank you page (order confirmation page)
Among these fields, which ones are mandatory and which are not?
What is the format of the export file ? Should I export each time all records or only the non-exported ones ?
See in the description the mantatory filed and Format (csv, ";")
Is there any pre-defined order of the fields ?

Hi,
the NPS BE functionality, including the export cron job, is implemented. Please assign it to FE developer for the FE part.

/Nabil.

Hello Erik,

could you please take care of the FE part of this ticket?
Because I will be on holiday till Tue 26.05

Thanks,
Ruben

@Nabil: Could you please Change the Export to add the "Input Date" and the "Domain" (distrelec.ch, distrelec.de,...). Export each week Input Date > Monday current week and Input Date <= Sunday current week.

thx
The new fields has been added.
Should NOT be in the P-Deployment of sprint 11. Should earliest go live with sprint 2015-06.

Optivo will push the dynamic values on the url of our NPS final page. It would look something like this:

http://www.distrelec.de/de/cms/nps?order=003UUL0A&cnumber=1386864&fname=Andreas&Namn=Petterson&email=andreaserikpettersson@yahoo.se

will it work? you need to take all this values as hidden and attach them to the form submit.

Hi Angel,

Please use "https" instead of "http" because of private data in the URL.

Hi Angel Munoz | Distrelec
Yes, we can read these parameters from the URL

Hi Nabil, Actually Optivo also suggests MD5 encoding.

Just asked Ruben and David, but maybe you can tell me.

Hi Angel,

MD5 encoding is not reversible, i.e., from MD5 hash we cannot get the original text. However, we can use other encryption algorithms, such as AES, which are reversible. These algorithms uses a secret key to encrypt/decrypt text.

AES: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Advanced_Encryption_Standard
Will let this guys know. Thanks Nabil!!
Please add remaining estimate, thx.

This ticket is around 70-80% done.
We just need this URL encoding.
Waiting for Angel response

Hello Angel,

we need to know more about this encoding. You have any news?
And also an example of URL, or specification, to see how this URL will be (exact name of each parameter, etc)

Thanks
according to Andrea we do not implement this anymore. I will close the ticket and it can be re-open anytime.

Wrong... This ticket is still NPS, no matter if Confirmation or CMS page.
Reopen and cannot be closed unless I review

Normal link:

http://www.distrelec.de/de/cms/nps?order=

{Order Number}&cnumber=234567&fname=Angel&Namn=Munoz&email=angel.munoz@distrelec.com

Encoded email link:

http://www.distrelec.de/de/cms/nps?order={Order Number}

&cnumber=234567&fname=Angel&Namn=Munoz&email=YW5nZWwubXVub3pAZGlzdHJlbGVjLmNvbQ==

Check the dynamic variables.
Order
Cnumber
Fname
Namn
Email

Hello Angel,
What type of encoding are they using?
We need to know how to decode that URL
Thanks
I cannot access Jira…. Problems?
Generation of the "Feedback" report must be generated DAILY and sent to email addresses provided by ALE.

Still have not received a working version of the NPS form to test on "Q".
URGENT!!
„each day“ a report (excel file) would be created with all the customer details and qualitative feedback that will then be sent to dedicated email addresses in each country

Hi Angel, to proceed here, please answer the following questions:

  1. What kind of encoding is used on the links from optivo?
  2. To which email addresses should the report be sent?
    and:
    Please create the CMS page where we can place the form.

1. Encoding used is Base64.

$!{null}#if("$Unable to render embedded object: File (user.data.email" != "")$) not found.{null}${bmMisc.encodeBase64($!user.data.email)}$!{null}#end$!{null}

I recommend using the url without encoding, at least in the first implementation.

2. Email addresses will be provided tomorrow.

CMS page is: http://test.distrelec.de/de/survey/cms/nps
(same naming will apply to all countries and languages)

Variables that come with the url:
https://www.distrelec.de/de/cms/nps?order=

{Order Number}&cnumber={Customer Number}&fname={Firstname}&namn={Lastname}&email={Email}&lang={Language}&company={Company Name}&delivery={Parcel Date}

Var = Value --> {Parameter Definition}

* salesorg = 7350 --> {Sales Org}
* contactnum = 326411 --> {Contact Number}
* cnumber = 1202553 --> {Customer Number}
* order = 003UUL0A --> {Order Number}
  • fname = Armin --> {Contact FirstName}
  • namn = Freaking --> {Contact LastName}
  • email = zilling@most-mobile.net --> {Email}
  • lang = DE --> {Language}
  • company = MOST Mobile Specials GmbH --> {Company Name}
  • delivery = 20150622 --> {Parcel Date}
The list broke and cannot fix it...

• Sprogis, Peteris peteris.sprogis@elfa.se Baltics (LT, LV, EE)

Contacts for NPS feedback
Adjusted estimation because of the change of requirement.

$!{null}#if("$Unable to render embedded object: File (user.data.email" != "")$) not found.{null}${bmMisc.encodeBase64($!user.data.email)}$!{null}#end$!{null}

What is this ????

Don't worry about it. It is just the way that Optivo is programing internally the Base64 coding of the email address. It was just for informational purposes in case it was helpful for you.
I think we do better without encoding at least in the beginning.

Only consideration should be to pass the values from the url to the "submit" of the form and the DB

Variables that come with the url:
https://www.distrelec.de/de/cms/nps?salesorg=7350&contactnum=326411&order=003UUL0A&cnumber=1202553&fname=Armin&namn=Freaking&email=zilling%40most-mobile.net&lang=de&company=MOST%20Mobile%20Specials%20GmbH&delivery=20150622

Only the email field is mandatory. (data on ERP is not clean and we don't have a name field in all records)
Here is the new complete address to be used (as sent by optivo):

https://www.distrelec.de/de/feedback/nps?salesorg={salesorg}&contactnum={contactnum}&order={Order Number}&cnumber={customerno}&fname={firstname}&namn={lastname}&email={email}&lang={language}&company={companyname}&delivery={deliverydate}
You can remove the salesOrg parameter, this one we can retrieve it directly from the shop settings.
Please add the FE part.
Should we also save the language ? or it is not important?
What are the email addresses for DK and EX (export shop)?

FE & BE parts done.

The new CMS page is called: "netPromoterScorePage"
It has the Content Slot "MoodImage", where you can place a Simple Banner Component with the image.

Attached you can find a preview on my local env.

Thanks
I need all final survey urls as soon as they are available (13 countries + proditec). Proditec was a last minute request and can be delayed, not the rest.
Hi Ruben, Angel is aware of the risks - It should be deployed with the next Version to Q (v3.5.2)

Angel Munoz | Distrelec, the only thing missing is the translation for the title. I only have it in EN and DE.

"Are you satisfied with Distrelec? Your opinion matters."

After that, ready for the next Q deployment.

Translations completed.
Ready for deployment

Champion!!!   Los puedo ver en “Q” o todavia no?

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6655] EX - Registration
item.description:
Requirement

  • Dropdown on top of the form, containing ALL countries from list. (See: Countries & Shipping overview)
  • Default payment methods for new customers: CreditCard, PayPal and Prepaid-Invoice (defined from SAP).
  • Implementation of a logic during the registration process based on the customer type (EU or Non EU) in relation to the country selection. Depending on selection, different fields are shown on the registration-form(VAT-ID or Organizational number) and different Transportation-methods are available to the customer. See: Delivery terms.

B2B-Specific

  • VAT-ID or Organizational number:
    • VAT-ID & Organizational number present. VAT-ID is Mandatory for EU-countries.
    • Non-EU: Only organizational number present, not mandatory. (SAP Taxnumber 2)
  • EU-Only: Warning-message on top of registration page should be shown: “Please register with a valid VAT-ID of your country if you don’t want Dutch tax being charged on your orders.”
  • NEW: Phone or Mobile needs to be mandatory at registration.

Test-URL: http://test.distrelec.biz

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Please estimate, you can come back to me if something is unclear. Thx
The backend task is already in place. Assign it to FE developer.
Note: As Long as our Jira/Development process hasn't been improved, I Need to put it back to open however this Change is APPROVED
Ticket treated as prio 1 for the Elfa Rollout (in alignment with Jörg Loch), e-mail from Oana to Rafael (29.04.15)
Has been deployed to Q - Please test, thanks.
Reopened, details will follow.

Open Points:

  1. Move the country-selection to the top.
  2. Implementation of a logic during the registration process based on the customer type (EU or Non EU) in relation to the country selection. Depending on selection, different fields are shown on the registration-form(VAT-ID or Organizational number) and different Transportation-methods are available to the customer. See: Delivery terms.
    • VAT-ID & Organizational number present. VAT-ID is Mandatory for EU-countries.
    • Non-EU: Only organizational number present, not mandatory. (SAP Taxnumber 2)
  3. EU-Only: Warning-message on top of registration page should be shown: “Please register with a valid VAT-ID of your country if you don’t want Dutch tax being charged on your orders.”
  4. ONLY Phone or Mobile needs to be mandatory at registration. (FAX is not mandatory).

Hi,
The 500 error is already resolved. Ruben will implement a logic to change the shop settings on country selection at the registration time to ensure that we are using the correct country.
FE done. Please test after the next deployment

1. FE task (but not needed)
  2. FE task
  3. FE task
  4. BE done.
solved by Nabil.
Here I think the points 2 and 3, which are FE tasks, are still missing.

Hi Ruben, please take care of point 1, 2 and 3:

Open Points:

  1. Move the country-selection to the top.
  2. Implementation of a logic during the registration process based on the customer type (EU or Non EU) in relation to the country selection. Depending on selection, different fields are shown on the registration-form(VAT-ID or Organizational number) and different Transportation-methods are available to the customer. See: Delivery terms.
    • VAT-ID & Organizational number present. VAT-ID is Mandatory for EU-countries.
    • Non-EU: Only organizational number present, not mandatory. (SAP Taxnumber 2)
  3. EU-Only: Warning-message on top of registration page should be shown: “Please register with a valid VAT-ID of your country if you don’t want Dutch tax being charged on your orders.”
  4. ONLY Phone or Mobile needs to be mandatory at registration. (FAX is not mandatory).
FE changes done
Added fixversion v3.5.2 - needs to be tested after next Q deployment.

Hi Rafael,

v3.5.2 will be the next release.
